code: public void configure() {     errorHandler(noErrorHandler()).     // should work with no error handler as the stream cache     // is enabled and make sure the predicates can be evaluated     // multiple times     from("direct:start").streamCaching().choice().when().xpath("/message/text() = 'xx'").to("mock:x").when().xpath("/message/text() = 'yy'").to("mock:y").end(). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             errorHandler(noErrorHandler()).             // should work with no error handler as the stream cache             // is enabled and make sure the predicates can be evaluated             // multiple times             from("direct:start").streamCaching().choice().when().xpath("/message/text() = 'xx'").to("mock:x").when().xpath("/message/text() = 'yy'").to("mock:y").end().         }     }. }
